short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin enables the user to load the Google search engine results page for a specific location and language.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Chrome extension that enables the user to render the SERPs in any region with the region's respective languages. It also has the functionality to store the userâ€™s desired SERP preferences under predefined user presets.
